description:
SCOREGolf, Canada’s number one golf media brand, is proud to present SCOREGolf News.  SCOREGolf features the latest golf news, blogs, videos and event photos.  Enjoy all the news from the PGA, LPGA, Nationwide , Canadian, European, and Champions Tours, brought to you by the most respected name in Canadian golf: Bob Weeks and team.  SCOREGolf’s coverage includes tournament previews, player interviews, product reviews, and instructional pieces on how to improve your game.

SCOREGolf has you covered so you can keep updated on everyone from Mike Weir to Tiger Woods, improve your game, or plan where to travel for your next golf getaway.

SCOREGolf also allows you to share content through your Facebook and Twitter accounts, save your favorite content, and email content you your friends.
